item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 3/16 | Weekly Update #8
item.description: Week 3 of 16 in my Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training plan is completed! This week I also wore the Hoka One One Gaviota 2 for all runs.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 2/16 | Weekly Update #7
item.description: Second week of 16 of my Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training plan done! All the runs and stats below. Also received a pair of the Hoka One One Gaviota 2 that I tried out last week.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 1/16 | Weekly Update #6
item.description:
First week of the Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training Plan with Coach Amy is done!
And I tried some new shoes.
